 2024-12332024-11-21PMO
ActPilotage Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration and certain conditions of employment of JAMES DONALD POUND, part-time Chairperson of the Great Lakes Pilotage Authority, for the period he is acting as Chief Executive Officer of the Great Lakes Pilotage Authority, effective June 4, 2024, until such time he is no longer required to act as Chief Executive Officer.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order fixing the remuneration and certain conditions of employment of JAMES DONALD POUND, part-time Chairperson of the Great Lakes Pilotage Authority, for the period he is acting as Chief Executive Officer of the Great Lakes Pilotage Authority, effective June 4, 2024, until such time he is no longer required to act as Chief Executive Officer.
